author: Tim Fitzsimons
title: Coronavirus behind bars: Prisoners being freed to slow spread in 'virus vectors'
description: Prison and human rights advocates are raising calls for broad inmate releases to slow the spread of COVID-19 in the country’s overcrowded prisons and jails.
content:
Advocates are calling for large-scale prison releases to knock back the coronavirus, as detention facilities throughout the country report positive cases among inmates and staff.
Across the United States, local and state officials have begun freeing low-leve… [+6637 chars]
